title: Hearing & balance exams
description: Have trouble hearing? Medicare's hearing exam coverage may be right for you. Use Medicare for diagnostic hearing & balancing exam costs. Learn more.
cleaned_text: Your doctor or other health care provider may recommend you get services more often than Medicare covers. Or, they may recommend services that Medicare doesn't cover. If this happens, you may have to pay some or all of the costs. Ask questions so you understand why your doctor is recommending certain services and if, or how much, Medicare will pay for them.
